title: Where in the World is Jordan?
description: An interactive travel tracker showing my journey across the globe. Navigate through time to follow the path.

title: Regulatory Change Tracker
description: A live dashboard pulling from FinCEN, OCC, CFPB, and FRB feeds to categorize regulatory updates by topic.

title: Corporate FP&A Dashboard
description: Interactive financial planning dashboard with variance analysis, driver-based forecasting, and scenario modeling for a mid-size SaaS company.
